name: application_search
description: This function is used to search something on an application on TV device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device which needs to be used to launch the application is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the air conditioner is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to be used to launch an application.

parameters.name: app_name
parameters.description: The application which the user intends to launch on the device.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The search query for the application.
